mapper.select: select INFO_TYPE, count(id) as INFO_COUNT from VIEW_INFORMATION group by INFO_TYPE
SELECT TOPIC_CATEGORY, count( id ) AS count FROM VIEW_INFORMATION GROUP BY TOPIC_CATEGORY
SELECT PROFESSION_FIELD, count( id ) AS count FROM VIEW_INFORMATION GROUP BY PROFESSION_FIELD
SELECT year, count( id ) AS count FROM VIEW_INFORMATION GROUP BY year ORDER BY year desc

SELECT * FROM VIEW_INFORMATION WHERE INFO_TYPE IN (${searchOption.infoType}) AND TOPIC_CATEGORY IN (${searchOption.topicCategory}) AND PROFESSION_FIELD IN (${searchOption.professionField})AND year IN (${searchOption.year}) AND
( INFO_TITLE like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{searchOption.searchInput}),'%') OR INFO_AUTHOR like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{searchOption.searchInput}),'%') OR KEYWORDS like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{searchOption.searchInput}),'%') )
AND ${searchOption.searchType} like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{searchOption.searchInput}),'%')
order by format_time desc, id desc
